description:
Jumonji finally gets a chance to impress Sakura when he tries to quell a mischievous spirit. Later, Sakura and Rinne help a "creepy" spirit give the performance of his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La pierre de pouvoir errante – Poltergeist – Les tabous des Shinigami
Samayoeru Power Stone / Poltergeist / Shinigami Sakai no Taboo
Wandering Power Stone / Poltergeist / The Taboo in the Shinigami World
さまよえるパワーストーン / ポルターガイスト / 死神界のタブー
